mapper.update: update orders set petId = #{petId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shipDate = #{shipDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pstatus = #{pstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, petId, quantity, shipDate, pstatus, complete from orders
